price: ឬមួយពួកគេមានកម្មសិទិ្ធគ្រប់គ្រងមួយចំណែក? ប្រសិន បើដូច្នោះ ពួកគេនឹងមិនអាចផ្តល់ឱ្យមនុស្សលោកសូម្បីតែបន្តិច បានឡើយ។
arabic: أَمۡ لَهُمۡ نَصِيبٞ مِّنَ ٱلۡمُلۡكِ فَإِذٗا لَّا يُؤۡتُونَ ٱلنَّاسَ نَقِيرًا

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: am lahum naṣībun mina al-mul'ki fa-idhan lā yu'tūna al-nāsa naqīran
translations: (even as much as the) speck on a date seed
